text: RoboCop 2 is a 1990 American cyberpunk action-superhero film directed by Irvin Kershner, written by Frank Miller and Walon Green, and starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Dan O'Herlihy, Belinda Bauer, Tom Noonan and Gabriel Damon. Set in the near future in a dystopian metropolitan Detroit, Michigan, it is the sequel to the 1987 film, RoboCop.While receiving mixed reviews from critics and fans, the film received attention in 2013 from news media due to its plot predicting Detroit filing for bankruptcy in the future.It was the final film directed by Irvin Kershner.
